body:
I bought emerald not too long ago, but 3 weeks after I bought it, it hasn't let me connect to avicus. For 3 months, I haven't been able to connect! I just the following IPs: skywars.co and wallsmc.com
Please help me, avicus is my favorite server!

title: HELP ME!!

replies.body: You can join with the IP avic.us and if you haven't received in game you can email support@avicus.net .
replies.body_tagged: You can join with the IP avic.us and if you haven't received in game you can email support@avicus.net .

replies.body:
Hey! If does Ip´s dont work, you can just type on Direct connect nebula01.avic.us and then Move around to the Hub and to the others servers!
See you!
replies.body_tagged:
Hey! If does Ip´s dont work, you can just type on Direct connect nebula01.avic.us and then Move around to the Hub and to the others servers!

replies.body:
Ok, first of all, your rank isn't related with your connection so that's not the problem.
Now, if you wanna play, you can try this IPs:
- nexus01.avic.us (Nexus)
- walls01.avic.us (Walls)
- nebula01.avic.us (Nebula)
- icarus.avic.us
- cronus.avic.us
And so on, just change the numbers. I'm also aware I didn't write down CTH nor Elimination but that's because no one plays them anymore :c
Now, bye and enjoy your rank!
